a: It suggests daily menus of Challenges to test your Mindset in Action.

q: How do I submit my challenge?
a: Click on this link https://www.fundamentaldecisions.com/2025/08/23/submission/ to submit your Challenge. You have 24 hours to submit.

q: Can I pick multiple dishes a day?
a: Yes — you can pick any dish anytime, Menus will be rotated everytime you open the bot and Dishes will be displayed according to time of the day. Each will give you a new challenge :)
You will receive a Persona Card — a snapshot of your mindset in action, within 24 hours from your submission.
